ame":"_amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"transferCarbonCredits","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"_RealWorldData","type":"string"}],"name":"verifyRealWorldState","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._"},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addHardwareDevice(address)":{"details":"This function add hardware device address. Only agent can call this function","params":{"_hardwareAddress":"address of hardware device"}},"finishAuction()":{"details":"This function send a finish command to Auction Cartesi Machine. This function need be called by the same person who called newAuction function."},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getURI()":{"details":"This function get lilium URI using IPFS library","returns":{"_0":"string URI"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"increaseAllowance()":{"details":"This function increase allowance to mint token. Only verifier cartesi machine can call this function"},"mint(uint256)":{"details":"This function mint token (CarbonCredit) to an address verifying if the company has enough allowance and decrease allowance after mint token. Only agent can call this function","params":{"_amount":"amount of token to mint"}},"newAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function create new auction. Only agent can call this function. In the process, the function gives permission for the ERC20Portal contract to transfer the wallet value from msg.sender to the cartesi dapp and then calls the ERC20Portal sending in addition to the value an _executelayerdata in bytes containing the duration of the auction and the _reservePricePerToken","params":{"_amount":"amount of token to auction","_duration":"duration of auction in hours","_reservePricePerToken":"reserve price per token"}},"newBid(uint256)":{"details":"this function transfer an amount in ether to Auction Cartesi Machine calling EtherPortal contract sending in addition to the value an _executelayerdata in bytes containing the interestedQuantity of the amount offered","params":{"_interestedQuantity":"interested quantity of the amount offered"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setAuxiliaryContracts(address,address)":{"details":"This function set cartesi verifier and auction contract address after deploy, because it is not possible to set it before deploy since the cartesi machine is deployed later. In addition, it grant verifier and auction role to the contracts and send cartesi machine address to cartesi dapp via relay","params":{"_cartesiAuction":"address of cartesi auction contract","_cartesiVerifier":"address of cartesi verifier contract"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferCarbonCredits(address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer token (CarbonCredit) to an address by company agent.","params":{"_amount":"amount of token to transfer","_to":"address to transfer token"}},"verifyRealWorldState(string)":{"details":"This function verify real world state. Only hardware device can call this function","params":{"_RealWorldData":"real world data. Which will be a json in bytes"}}},"title":"Company","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"addHardwareDevice(address)":{"notice":"Add hardware device"},"finishAuction()":{"notice":"finishAuction to Auction Cartesi Machine"},"getURI()":{"notice":"Get Lilium URI"},"increaseAllowance()":{"notice":"Increase allowance to mint token"},"mint(uint256)":{"notice":"Mint token"},"newAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Create new auction"},"newBid(uint256)":{"notice":"Create new bid"},"setAuxiliaryContracts(address,address)":{"notice":"Set Cartesi Certifier Contract"},"verifyRealWorldState(string)":{"notice":"Verify real world state"}},"notice":"This contract is a insterface to interact with verifier and auction cartesi machine, and other attributes of addHardwareDevice(address).details: This function add hardware device address. Only agent can call this function

finishAuction().details: This function send a finish command to Auction Cartesi Machine. This function need be called by the same person who called newAuction function.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getURI().details: This function get lilium URI using IPFS library

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

increaseAllowance().details: This function increase allowance to mint token. Only verifier cartesi machine can call this function

mint(uint256).details: This function mint token (CarbonCredit) to an address verifying if the company has enough allowance and decrease allowance after mint token. Only agent can call this function

newAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: This function create new auction. Only agent can call this function. In the process, the function gives permission for the ERC20Portal contract to transfer the wallet value from msg.sender to the cartesi dapp and then calls the ERC20Portal sending in addition to the value an _executelayerdata in bytes containing the duration of the auction and the _reservePricePerToken

newBid(uint256).details: this function transfer an amount in ether to Auction Cartesi Machine calling EtherPortal contract sending in addition to the value an _executelayerdata in bytes containing the interestedQuantity of the amount offered

params._interestedQuantity: interested quantity of the amount offered

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setAuxiliaryContracts(address,address).details: This function set cartesi verifier and auction contract address after deploy, because it is not possible to set it before deploy since the cartesi machine is deployed later. In addition, it grant verifier and auction role to the contracts and send cartesi machine address to cartesi dapp via relay

transferCarbonCredits(address,uint256).details: Transfer token (CarbonCredit) to an address by company agent.

verifyRealWorldState(string).details: This function verify real world state. Only hardware device can call this function

params._RealWorldData: real world data. Which will be a json in bytes

documentation.text:
@notice Increase allowance to mint token
 @dev This function increase allowance to mint token. Only verifier cartesi machine can call this function

@notice finishAuction to Auction Cartesi Machine
 @dev This function send a finish command to Auction Cartesi Machine. This function need be called by the same person who called newAuction function.

@title Company
 @notice This contract is a insterface to interact with verifier and auction cartesi machine, and other attributes of company
